What is the purpose of training in a campaign?
The existence of training makes game sense only in campaigns, where the same investigators meet regularly to engage in an ongoing mystery.

How often can investigators learn new skills in a skill per four months of game time?
One should not go to school and learn more than 1D10 points in a skill per four months of game time without good reason.

The Keeper decides if multiple courses can be taken and how to judge if the investigator’s class participation is satisfactory.

What can happen to classroom work or practice if an investigator has too many adventures in a semester?
An experience check comes automatically upon successfully completing a segment of training; however too many adventures in a semester will invalidate classroom work or practice for that term.
